user_query: My family and I are planning a picnic and we need to buy groceries. Can you suggest some tofu products available in our area? Also, provide us with the detailed information of a specific product with the ID 85180. Furthermore, fetch the product details of a specific product with the ID 'B08N5R2GQW' from Amazon.

TaskList.description: Search for tofu products available in the user's local area.
Fetch detailed information of the tofu product with ID 85180.
Retrieve product details from Amazon for the product with ID 'B08N5R2GQW'.
